text: Lawrence Joseph "Larry" DeNardis (March 18, 1938 â€“ August 24, 2018) was an American politician. He was a member of the United States House of Representatives for the state of Connecticut's 3rd congressional district from 1981 to 1983. He was also president of the University of New Haven. He announced on January 12, 2010, that he was forming an exploratory committee to run for Governor of Connecticut in 2010 as a Republican.Christopher Keating, Former Congressman Larry DeNardis Running For Governor; Ex-college president is 11th Candidate in Race , Capitol Watch Blog, courant.com, January 13, 2010 DeNardis died from a short-illness in New Haven on August 24, 2018 at the age of 80. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1938 births Category:2018 deaths Category:United States representatives from Connecticut Category:Educators from New Haven, Connecticut Category:Politicians from New Haven, Connecticut Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
